entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Westport
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:10 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 5.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 08:00 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 5.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 89 %
Dewpoint: 4.3°C
Wind: SSE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. Temperature steady near 7.

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending before morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
